entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
